article.headline: Boston U. 71, Bucknell 68
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. -- Corey Lowe scored 19 points and John Holland had seven of Boston University's 12 points in overtime, leading the Terriers to a 71-68 victory over Bucknell on Tuesday night. Jake O'Brien added 15 points and Holland finished with 12 for the Terriers (1-1). Boston University was helped by 20-for-26 shooting from the free throw line and outscored the Bison 12-9 in the extra period. Justin Castleberry led Bucknell (0-2) with 17 points. Enoch Andoh and Bryan Cohen each added 10 points as the Bison shot 8-for-20 from 3-point range and 24-for-59 overall. Holland made two free throws with 1:12 left in regulation to tie it at 59.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
